Commissioner of Agrarian Services”, respectively; and, accordingly, in every context in'which tho Direotor of Food Prodagtion or an Assistant Director of Food Production is men- tioned (whether by that designation in full or by the abbreviated designation of Director or Assistant Diveotor) in any written law, or in any notioe, communication, form, or other document, required or authorised by any written law, there ball be sub. stituted, for the words “ Director of Food Produc- tion” or ‘ Director” or the words ‘" Assistant Director of Food Production” or ‘‘ Assistant Director”, the words ‘ Commissioner of Agrarian Services ”” or ‘‘ Assistant Commissioner of Agrarian Services’, as the case may be.
